title: How to Make Baked Mini Lasagnas

steps.headline: Collect your ingredients and supplies.
steps.description: Preheat oven to 375 F. (191 C.) degrees.

steps.headline: Coat each cup of the muffin tin with cooking spray.
Put one wonton wrapper in each cup of the muffin tin.
Into each cup, in this order, add 1 Tbsp (15 ml.)
steps.description: Marinara, 1 tsp (5 ml.) Ricotta and 1/4 tsp (1+ ml.) Pesto.

steps.headline: Put another wonton wrapper on top of the layers in each cup and add another layer of Marinara, Ricotta and.
Bake at 375 F. (191 C.) for 10 to 15 minutes, or until edges are golden brown.
Let stand for 3-5 minutes, in the pan, on a wire rack before serving.
Remove from pan, with fingers or spoon, and plate for serving.
This makes about 18 mini-lasagnas.
steps.description: An individual serving for dinner is 4 mini-lasagnas per person.

text: Collect your ingredients and supplies. Preheat oven to 375 F. (191 C.) degrees. Coat each cup of the muffin tin with cooking spray.  Put one wonton wrapper in each cup of the muffin tin.  Into each cup, in this order, add 1 Tbsp (15 ml.) Marinara, 1 tsp (5 ml.) Ricotta and 1/4 tsp (1+ ml.) Pesto. Put another wonton wrapper on top of the layers in each cup and add another layer of Marinara, Ricotta and.  Bake at 375 F. (191 C.) for 10 to 15 minutes, or until edges are golden brown.  Let stand for 3-5 minutes, in the pan, on a wire rack before serving.  Remove from pan, with fingers or spoon, and plate for serving.  This makes about 18 mini-lasagnas. An individual serving for dinner is 4 mini-lasagnas per person.
